about_the_game:
Welcome to your new job! As the dungeon's janitor you take care of our monsters' well-being, pick up adventurers' left-over limbs, decorate the dungeon and find ways to let our beloved Dungeon Master look more competent.

In this Visual Novel slash Dungeon Crawler slash Room Decoration Simulator you will find new friends, a purpose, and maybe ... *the artifact*?

  • Interactive environment and NPCs
  • All original IP and story
  • Non-linear story-telling with a love for lore in a semi-open world
  • Gritty retro look and feel
  • Decorate rooms to your and the monsters' liking with nice furniture
